originalText.text: I really enjoy being a patient of Dr. Devoti's. He does a great job explaining the process in layman's terms and making his patients feel at ease. His dental assistant, Kales, was extremely attentive, clean and helpful -- emphasis on CLEAN. I wish to have this duo each time I visit for a procedure. Thanks for a seamless appointment.

text.text: I really enjoy being a patient of Dr. Devoti's. He does a great job explaining the process in layman's terms and making his patients feel at ease. His dental assistant, Kales, was extremely attentive, clean and helpful -- emphasis on CLEAN. I wish to have this duo each time I visit for a procedure. Thanks for a seamless appointment.

originalText.text: Amazingly smooth! I was so worried about the dental work I was about to have done. Dr Devoti and his assistant let me know what was happening at each step of the process and put my mind at ease. It was painless for the most part and I was out within 45 mins.

text.text: Amazingly smooth! I was so worried about the dental work I was about to have done. Dr Devoti and his assistant let me know what was happening at each step of the process and put my mind at ease. It was painless for the most part and I was out within 45 mins.

originalText.text: Honest, upfront doctor. Incredibly understanding and accommodating when I have major issues or just a simple question. I can recommend Dr. Devoti with confidence.

text.text: Honest, upfront doctor. Incredibly understanding and accommodating when I have major issues or just a simple question. I can recommend Dr. Devoti with confidence.

originalText.text: Honestly it’s the best dental place I ever been in my life from A to Z they are  very welcoming and caring about your issue really professional

text.text: Honestly it’s the best dental place I ever been in my life from A to Z they are  very welcoming and caring about your issue really professional

originalText.text: I did not enjoy my experience with Dr. Devoti and will be seeing another dentist from now on. I went in for a filling. He was friendly at first and said just let him know if anything hurts and he will stop immediately. The novocaine hadn't set in yet, and I felt pain when he started drilling. He gave me a second dose, but only waited 1-2 minutes before proceeding. I could still feel the pain, but when I said this he ran me through a series of questions and pokes. I could tell by the line of questioning that he assumed I was nervous and that my pain was psychosomatic. He continued drilling even when I was raising my hand for him to stop. By the time he was near the end of drilling I could tell the novocaine was finally fully kicking in. For fillings in the past I have had to have a second dose of novocaine (while waiting extra time for it to set in), and every dentist always trusts my word that I can still feel the pain and they respond accordingly. Never have I had a dentist that doubted my pain and experience and then kept drilling when I asked them to stop. Medical professionals need to remember they're working with human beings.

By the time he was near the end of drilling I could tell the novocaine was finally fully kicking in. For fillings in the past I have had to have a second dose of novocaine (while waiting extra time for it to set in), and every dentist always trusts my word that I can still feel the pain and they respond accordingly. Never have I had a dentist that doubted my pain and experience and then kept drilling when I asked them to stop. Medical professionals need to remember they're working with human beings.
